name: Geo Application
description:
When Geo is applied without dealing any DMG, the Elemental Reaction triggered will ignore DMG-dealing effects:
Cryo Crystallize: The opponent's active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points).
Hydro Crystallize: The opponent's active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points).
Pyro Crystallize: The opponent's active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points).
Electro Crystallize: The opponent's active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points).
descriptionraw:
When {SPRITE_PRESET#2106}Geo is applied without dealing any DMG, the Elemental Reaction triggered will ignore DMG-dealing effects:
{SPRITE_PRESET#2106}{SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Cryo Crystallize</color>: The opponent's active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points).
{SPRITE_PRESET#2106}{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Hydro Crystallize</color>: The opponent's active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points).
{SPRITE_PRESET#2106}{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Pyro Crystallize</color>: The opponent's active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points).
{SPRITE_PRESET#2106}{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Electro Crystallize</color>: The opponent's active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points).
